name: Legend Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Legend Aviation (Pty) Ltd, based at Virginia Airport in Durban, South Africa, offers comprehensive flight training in both helicopter and fixed-wing aircraft. With branches in Cape Town, Johannesburg, Zimbabwe, and Mozambique, we provide personalized and highly specialized training from Private Pilot (PPL) to Commercial Pilot (CPL) licenses. Our small school setting ensures more one-on-one time with instructors, enhancing the learning experience. We also assist foreign students with visas, accommodation, and transport. Our training programs are designed to prepare students for various aviation careers, and we pride ourselves on employing or placing our successful graduates. With over 10 years of experience in surveillance, cargo services, and emergency medical evacuations, Legend Aviation is committed to delivering safe, reliable, and professional aviation training. We strive to make every student's aviation dreams a reality.
